name: David's Midnight Magic II
overview: An unofficial sequel to the well known Pinball game by the group Fairlight. In principle the same pinball only with improved graphics and covered SID tunes... also the physical behaviour seems to have changed.. Published in Italy by Pubblirome\Edigamma publishing as Mega Tilt in Super C64 e C128 n.34 (maggio 1989) and several other publications.
